execution_quality: The agent successfully identified and fixed the spacing issues in the onboarding text, but the work was incomplete as a subsequent user message revealed an additional broken line in hook description that wasn't caught.
work_category: UI formatting fixes for a Claude Code onboarding interface, addressing spacing issues in option descriptions and hook documentation.
summary: The agent made targeted edits to fix spacing issues in onboarding text but missed or introduced another formatting problem (broken line in hook description) that the user identified immediately after. While the agent worked independently and stayed focused on the requested formatting fixes, the incomplete resolution suggests either insufficient testing or incomplete understanding of all formatting issues present in the interface.
follow_up_pattern: User reported a new issue (broken line in hook description) immediately after the initial fixes, suggesting the first iteration didn't fully address all formatting problems.
